metadata.synopsis: If Lae'zel or GITH avatar is present they react to interacting with the apple crate in the corridor. If they aren't present, some other party character reacts with generic comment.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load up CRE_Main_AGo to 1382; -2; -796Interact with the apple crate, and then close it.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: I always wondered what githyanki eat.
